params.1450: When wearing four Saradomin items, if you've taken damage from an NPC or a Player in the last 3.6 seconds your max hit is increased by 2. Poison does not trigger this effect.
params.1451: When wearing four Saradomin items, if you've taken damage from an NPC or a Player in the last 3.6 seconds your max hit is increased by 5. Poison does not trigger this effect.
params.1452: When wearing four Saradomin items, if you've taken damage from an NPC or a Player in the last 3.6 seconds your max hit is increased by 10. Poison does not trigger this effect.
